name: Beyond "Atlantis And Beyond" Quiz | Video Games | 10 Questions

questions.text: True or false. This game takes you to Tibet?
questions.explanation:
True.

	This game looks so real, it almost feels like you really are there.

questions.text: True or false. This game takes you to China?
True or false. This game takes you to the United States?
True or false. This game takes you to Yuchatan?
In Europe this same game has been released under a different name. That name would be?
questions.explanation:
Atlantis II.

	The Crystal Key is actually the game before Beyond Atlantis.

questions.text: True or false. In this game you can go to Atlantis?
questions.explanation:
True.

	I would have hoped that you got this one correct seeing as how the name of the game is 'Beyond Atlantis.'

questions.text: True or false. In this game you can visit the mystical land of Shambhala?
True or false. This game has over 60 characters modeled in 3D?
questions.explanation:
True.

	This game never has a boring moment. With this many characters, how could it? It seems that you are always meeting someone new.

questions.text: According to the ESRB, this game has been rated what?
questions.explanation:
E.

	There is not any fighting in this game. It is a nice game for the family to play. It is a true game of thinking and skill.

questions.text: How many discs are there to this game?
questions.explanation:
4.

	There are four in this game and they are all different colors, red, blue, green, and yellow.
